participant_1.background:
I comfort myself with my dolls.
I like to spend my free time doing activities that I can profit from, like selling items online or doing odd jobs for people.
I can't do gymnastics if I were blind because I need to see my surroundings and the equipment to be able to do them safely.
my favorite singer is justin timberlike.
i geocache in my spare time.

participant_2.background:
I'm moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams.
i am a marathon runner.
i like to sing broadway show tunes.
I knit myself a sweater that is so warm and comfy, and it also helps me fight my sweet tooth because I'm too busy knitting to eat gummy worms!
My sister is a teacher, and my niece and nephew are still in school.

content.text: Hey! Not much, just packing up my stuff and getting ready to move to a new city.
Oh thats awesome! What city are you moving to?
I'm moving to Chicago! I'm really excited to start my culinary career there.
That is so exciting! I've heard great things about Chicago. Do you know what kind of food you want to cook?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm really interested in learning more about Italian cuisine.
That sounds delicious! I love pasta and pizza.
Me too! I'm also really interested in learning how to make pasta from scratch.
That would be so cool! I've never tried making pasta from scratch before.
It's not too hard, and it's really fun! You should give it a try sometime.
I will! Thanks for the tip!
No problem! So, what do you do for fun?
I like to geocache, sing karaoke, and play with my dolls.
Geocaching sounds like a lot of fun! I've never done it before, but I've heard good things about it.
It is! It's a great way to explore new places and get some exercise.
I love exploring new places, so I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
